content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":170541,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前らじゃなくて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Not you guys,"},{"lineNumber":170542,"originalJapaneseLine":"　切り捨てていい奴を向かわせればいいだろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You should send those who can be discarded instead."},{"lineNumber":170543,"originalJapaneseLine":"「が、はっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah, ha...\""},{"lineNumber":170544,"originalJapaneseLine":"背後から魔物兵の頭を","translatedEnglishLine":"From behind, the head of a monster soldier"},{"lineNumber":170545,"originalJapaneseLine":"マッスルが思い切り殴り飛ばし気絶させた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Muscle punched hard and knocked him out."},{"lineNumber":170546,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うちには切り捨てていい奴なんていねぇよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We don't have anyone here that can be thrown away.\""},{"lineNumber":170547,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":170548,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":170549,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこまでだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's enough!\""},{"lineNumber":170550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおっ、なんだ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, what!?"},{"lineNumber":170551,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、この声は、まさか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, this voice, could it be...?"},{"lineNumber":170552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マエリータ隊、参上！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maerita Squad, here!\""},

{"lineNumber":170553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう、覚えていて貰えたとは光栄ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, I'm honored that you remember me.\""},{"lineNumber":170554,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへっ、こういうの、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, something like this,"},{"lineNumber":170555,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なーんか久しぶりでいいねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"feels good because it’s been a while.\""},{"lineNumber":170556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やいやいやい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, hey!"},{"lineNumber":170557,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴様らよくも美樹ちゃんをさらったな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"How dare you kidnap Miki-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":170558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「美樹ちゃん、返してもらえないと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you don't return Miki-chan,"},{"lineNumber":170559,"originalJapaneseLine":"　悲しいから返してもらいます」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll be sad, so you’ll have to give her back.\""},{"lineNumber":170560,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人はすぐさま武器を構えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two immediately took up their weapons."},

{"lineNumber":170561,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーっと、そういう話は後回しだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, let's put that talk aside for now!\""},{"lineNumber":170562,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あと数分で、この辺りは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In a few minutes, this area"},{"lineNumber":170563,"originalJapaneseLine":"　火砕流で真っ赤に染まります」","translatedEnglishLine":"will be dyed red by a pyroclastic flow.\""},{"lineNumber":170564,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?"},{"lineNumber":170565,"originalJapaneseLine":"クイッとマッスルが背後を指さす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Muscle pointed sharply behind him."},

{"lineNumber":170566,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから迎えにきたのさ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's why I came to pick you up."},{"lineNumber":170567,"originalJapaneseLine":"　入り口に向かうぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's head to the entrance.\""},{"lineNumber":170568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「邪魔は入って欲しくない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don’t want any interference."},{"lineNumber":170569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　決着は、中でつけましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's settle this inside.\""},{"lineNumber":170570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私達についてきて下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please follow us.\""},{"lineNumber":170571,"originalJapaneseLine":"学者達が率先して、入り口を目指す。","translatedEnglishLine":"The scholars took the lead, heading toward the entrance."},

{"lineNumber":170572,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……勝手なこと言って、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"... Saying whatever they want,"},{"lineNumber":170573,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝手にズンズン進んで行きやがる」","translatedEnglishLine":"and barging forward without permission.\""},{"lineNumber":170574,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ど、どうしますか、ランス様？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What should we do, Lord Rance?\""},{"lineNumber":170575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……罠に決まってる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's obviously a trap."},{"lineNumber":170576,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言う通りにすることはないぞ、ランス」","translatedEnglishLine":"We shouldn’t just do as they say, Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":170577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここにいても死ぬだけらしいしなあ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems we’d just die if we stay here anyway."},{"lineNumber":170578,"originalJapaneseLine":"　行くか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go.\""},{"lineNumber":170579,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ！？　こ、こら！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh!? H-Hey!\""},{"lineNumber":170580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「た、たまにはサテラの言うことを聞けーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-Listen to Satera for once---!\""},{"lineNumber":170581,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おら、チンタラせず入れ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, don’t dawdle, get in!"},{"lineNumber":170582,"originalJapaneseLine":"　門を閉めるぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m closing the gate!\""},{"lineNumber":170583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まずいまずい、もう来るぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is bad, bad, they’re coming!\""},{"lineNumber":170584,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とーーーーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hyaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":170585,"originalJapaneseLine":"ごろごろごろー！","translatedEnglishLine":"(rumble rumble rumble)!"},{"lineNumber":170586,"originalJapaneseLine":"最後に残ったランスが転がりながら","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, the last one remaining, rolled"},{"lineNumber":170587,"originalJapaneseLine":"入り口から中に飛び込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"and jumped inside through the entrance."},{"lineNumber":170588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よっしゃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright!\""},{"lineNumber":170589,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを確認してから、","translatedEnglishLine":"After confirming that,"},{"lineNumber":170590,"originalJapaneseLine":"マッスルが仕掛けを動かし扉を閉めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Muscle activated the mechanism and closed the door."},{"lineNumber":170591,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおっ、すごい音だな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, what an incredible sound...\""},{"lineNumber":170592,"originalJapaneseLine":"扉の外は炎の川が雪崩のように","translatedEnglishLine":"Outside the door, a river of flames was avalanching"},{"lineNumber":170593,"originalJapaneseLine":"山を覆っていっている最中だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"over the mountain."},{"lineNumber":170594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあはあ……危ないところでしたね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, hah... That was close...\""},{"lineNumber":170595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、噴火がこんなすぐ来るとは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed, I didn’t expect the eruption to come so soon...\""},{"lineNumber":170596,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アーハハハハ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":170597,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺らまで死ぬとこだったな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We almost died too!\""},{"lineNumber":170598,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……貴様ら、敵だろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You all are enemies, aren't you?"},{"lineNumber":170599,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何故、助けた？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why did you help us?\""},{"lineNumber":170600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「決着を……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The settlement..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 切り捨てていい奴を向かわせればいいだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should send those who can be discarded instead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背後から魔物兵の頭を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From behind, the head of a monster soldier

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マッスルが思い切り殴り飛ばし気絶させた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muscle punched hard and knocked him out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うちには切り捨てていい奴なんていねぇよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We don't have anyone here that can be thrown away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、覚えていて貰えたとは光栄ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, I'm honored that you remember me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なーんか久しぶりでいいねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: feels good because it’s been a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様らよくも美樹ちゃんをさらったな！」
「美樹ちゃん、返してもらえないと
悲しいから返してもらいます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll be sad, so you’ll have to give her back."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人はすぐさま武器を構えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two immediately took up their weapons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーっと、そういう話は後回しだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, let's put that talk aside for now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火砕流で真っ赤に染まります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will be dyed red by a pyroclastic flow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クイッとマッスルが背後を指さす。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why I came to pick you up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決着は、中でつけましょう」
学者達が率先して、入り口を目指す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The scholars took the lead, heading toward the entrance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝手にズンズン進んで行きやがる」
言う通りにすることはないぞ、ランス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We shouldn’t just do as they say, Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここにいても死ぬだけらしいしなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems we’d just die if we stay here anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「た、たまにはサテラの言うことを聞けーー！」
「まずいまずい、もう来るぞー！」
最後に残ったランスが転がりながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, the last one remaining, rolled

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入り口から中に飛び込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and jumped inside through the entrance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マッスルが仕掛けを動かし扉を閉めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muscle activated the mechanism and closed the door.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 扉の外は炎の川が雪崩のように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Outside the door, a river of flames was avalanching

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山を覆っていっている最中だった。
「はあはあ……危ないところでしたね……」
「うむ、噴火がこんなすぐ来るとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed, I didn’t expect the eruption to come so soon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺らまで死ぬとこだったな！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:
